prompt.name: Search for a Product
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.nationalarchivesstore.org/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User utilizes the search bar to find a specific type of product and verifies the search results page.

input.action: 'Type `Mug` into the search bar at the top of the page', 'Click the search icon'

expected.outcome: The search results page is displayed, showing all products matching the 'Mug' keyword.

prompt.name: Filter and Sort Products in a Category
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.nationalarchivesstore.org/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to a product category, sorts the items by price, and then filters for in-stock items only.

input.action: 'Hover over the `DOCUMENTS,PRINTS & BOOKS` link in the main navigation menu', 'Click on the `Books` link from the dropdown', 'Click the feature dropdown and select `$ Low to High`', 'Wait for the product list to re-load', 'In the Product type Filer Dropped, click the `Book` checkbox', 'Wait for the product list to update'

expected.outcome: The product list on the 'Books' page is successfully sorted by price (ascending) and filtered to show only Book.

prompt.name: Add a Product to the Shopping Cart and Verify
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.nationalarchivesstore.org/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User finds a specific product, increases its quantity, adds it to the shopping cart, and then verifies the contents of the cart page.

input.action: 'Hover over the `HOME & OFFICE` link in the main navigation menu', 'Click on the `Mugs` link from the dropdown', 'Click on the product named `Amending America Emoji Mug`', 'On the product page, locate the quantity selector', 'Input Quantity `2`', 'Click the `Add to cart` button', 'Click the `Cart` button from header'

expected.outcome: The shopping cart page is displayed, showing two units of 'Amending America Emoji Mug', confirming the add-to-cart and quantity-update functionalities work.
